subsc: General energy sector,Renewable energy,Power,Oil and gas,Central government administration

abstracts.cdata!:
The Energy Sector Adjustment Program
            will support the Government of Honduras's comprehensive
            program of reforms in the energy sector, within the
            framework of its ongoing structural adjustment program. The
            program will include the following main elements: (1) sector
            institutional reform and strengthening; (2) electricity
            pricing to be based on sound economic criteria and financial
            improvement targets; (3) clearer policy-making and
            supervisory responsibility on the part of the Government of
            Honduras and performance accountability on the part of the
            National Power Company (NPC) through a contract-plan; (4) a
            Management and Operational Restructuring Program (MORP) to
            improve NPC's performance and a financial
            rehabilitation program to restore its financial soundness;
            (5) detailed plans of action for power and petroleum
            sectors; and (6) technical assistance.
